original_text: And the princes of Issachar were with Deborah; even Issachar, and also Barak: he was sent on foot into the valley. For the divisions of Reuben there were great thoughts of heart.
korean_text: 잇사갈의 방백들이 드보라와 함께 하니 잇사갈과 같이 바락도 그의 뒤를 따라 골짜기로 달려 내려가니 르우벤 시냇가에서 큰 결심이 있었도다

sentences.original_text: And the princes of Issachar were with Deborah
he was sent on foot into the valley.
there were great thoughts of heart.
